short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mistake-proof your cloud game. We color-code the environment name—red for prod, green for dev—making it obvious where you're working

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your cloud management on point. Our Chrome extension color-codes the environment name—red for production to grab your attention, and green for development to show you're good to go. This clear visual cue instantly shows where you're working, helping you avoid mix-ups. With just a glance, you're always sure about the environment, steering clear of costly mistakes.
